title.rendered: Air Sinai in Dorset, United Kingdom.

content.rendered:
Air Sinai is an airline based in Cairo, Egypt. It operates as a ‘paper airline’ for parent company EgyptAir under a wet lease-like agreement to serve flights exclusively between Egypt and Israel.

The airline was established in 1982 to fly scheduled services between Egypt and Israel

 

Air Sinai Address : 13 Freeland Park, Wareham Road, BH16 6FH, Poole, Dorset, United Kingdom.

Registration number: 07982158

Phone UK: + 44(0)844-5006408

Phone USA: + 1 917 6755197

Fax: + 44 (0)844-5886508

Email: reservations@flyairsinai.com

Air Sinai Official website : https://www.flyairsinai.com/

Fleet size: 02

  • Airbus A220

Air Sinai Baggage Allowance

Air Sinai Baggage

View Air Sinai Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Air Sinai Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Sinai in Dorset, United Kingdom Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Sinai in Dorset, United Kingdom: (click on the stars below)
